# Specialized Brute Chemicals
Nanotrasen's greatest scientists have synthesized three more specific brute chemicals! Each one heals a specific damage subtype.
# Razorium
[color=red]USE CAUTION[/color] when using the aforementioned specialized brute chemicals. Should one mix together with a different type of advanced brute chemical, the resulting mixture will create a dangerous chemical known as Razorium!
To avoid this, make sure the patient is done metabolizing one medication before giving them another. Keep an eye on the rate their health is changing.
[bold]Some examples of mixtures that create Razorium are as follows:[/bold]
Salicylic Acid and Puncturase
Puncturase and Lacerinol
Bruizine and Salicylic Acid
Lacerinol and Bruizine
Please note that [bold]any[/bold] combination of these 4 chemicals will likely mix and create Razorium!
